attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned, do not want one of the most iconic historical and sight seeing building in London to be renamed to "Queen Elizabeth Tower".  The name of the Bell within the clock Tower is named "Big Ben", but through out the world the term Big Ben has come to refer to the whole of the Tower.  Should this peition close after the change of name has happend, then the above still stands and we want the name changed back!
